page.title: 20LOCHGOILHEAD-ENERGY
page.content: Electricty is relatively new to Lochgoilhead.It was not till the 1950's that the village was connected to the Grid.We are part of the Hydro - Electric Board area.Many people still use paraffin for heating although gas in cylinders is becoming more popular. It is also used for heating.Oil is used by a few people but the most popular forms of heating are coal and wood. {PROJECT PERSONNEL The following people contributed to this project:Mr.D.MacGregor,Mr.Fisher, Mr.Prescott and the following pupils:- Duncan & Caroline McCready,Samantha Spencer,Ian & Jamie Prescott,Joe Todd, Katie Broadbent,Linda MacPherson, Isla MacFarlane,Wendy Hammon, Callum MacInnes,Alan McLaughlin and Kirstin MacGregor.
